calculateCommission(uint256).details: Calculate commission for a given amount

returns._0: The commission amount (1% or minCommission, whichever is higher)

incrementGovernanceAction(address).details: Increment governance action for a user Called by bridge when user performs governance actions

params._bridge: Address of NativeLZOpenworkBridge for cross-chain messaging
params._cctpReceiver: Address of CCTP receiver for USDC deposits

params._lockedAmount: Amount being locked for the milestone

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

releaseDisputedFunds(address,uint256,uin.details: Release disputed funds to winner (called by Native Athena)

params._lockedAmount: Amount to lock for next milestone
params._releasedAmount: Amount to release for current milestone

params.contractAddress: Address of contract to remove authorization

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._status: True to grant admin, false to revoke

params._cctpReceiver: Address of CCTP receiver for USDC deposits

params._useApplicantMilestones: True to use applicant's proposed milestones

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

addAuthorizedContract(address).notice: Add a contract to the authorized contracts list

applyToJob(address,string,string,string[.notice: Apply to a job with proposed milestones

calculateTokensForAmount(address,uint256.notice: Calculate tokens that would be earned for a payment amount

getUserEarnedTokens(address).notice: Get total tokens earned by a user

getUserGovernanceActions(address).notice: Get total governance actions for a user

getUserGovernanceActionsInBand(address,u.notice: Get governance actions for a user in a specific band

handleReleasePaymentCrossChain(address,s.notice: Handle cross-chain payment release request from bridge

handleStartDirectContract(address,addres.notice: Handle direct contract creation (job post + auto-application + start)

handleUpdateUserClaimData(address,uint25.notice: Handle claim data update from cross-chain message

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initialize the contract with required dependencies

isAuthorizedContract(address).notice: Check if a contract is authorized

lockNextMilestone(address,string,uint256.notice: Lock the next milestone for work

postJob(string,address,string,string[],u.notice: Post a new job with milestone payments

releasePaymentAndLockNext(address,string.notice: Release payment for current milestone and lock the next

removeAuthorizedContract(address).notice: Remove a contract from the authorized contracts list

setAdmin(address,bool).notice: Set admin status for an address

setApplicantChainDomain(string,address,u.notice: Set applicant's preferred payment chain domain for a job

setCCTPReceiver(address).notice: Set the CCTP receiver contract address

setCCTPTransceiver(address).notice: Set the CCTP transceiver contract for cross-chain transfers

setCommissionPercentage(uint256).notice: Set the commission percentage in basis points

setGenesis(address).notice: Set the genesis storage contract address

setNativeAthena(address).notice: Set the NativeAthena dispute resolution contract

setUsdcToken(address).notice: Set the USDC token contract address

startJob(address,string,uint256,bool).notice: Start a job by selecting an applicant

submitWork(address,string,string).notice: Submit work for the current milestone

syncRewardsData(bytes).notice: Sync user's rewards data to main chain for token claiming

teamTokensAllocated(address).notice: Get team tokens allocated to a user

upgradeFromDAO(address).notice: Upgrade contract implementation via DAO governance

withdrawAllCommission().notice: Withdraw all accumulated commission to treasury

withdrawCommission(uint256).notice: Withdraw a specific amount of accumulated commission to treasury
